SEARCH
Package org.example.oopproject1.cli

Class JobPortalCommands

java.lang.Object
org.example.oopproject1.cli.JobPortalCommands
@ShellComponent public class JobPortalCommands extends Object
CLI commands for the Job Portal system using Spring Shell. Provides job and recruiter management operations such as listing, filtering, viewing details, creating, toggling status, and deleting jobs, as well as listing recruiters. Interacts with JobService and RecruiterService to execute business logic.
Since:
1.0

  • Method Details

    • listJobs

      @ShellMethod(value="List all jobs", key="list-jobs") public String listJobs()
      Lists all available jobs in the system.
      Returns:
      formatted string of all jobs or a message if none are found

    • getJobDetails

      @ShellMethod(value="Get job details", key="job-details") public String getJobDetails(@ShellOption({"-i","--id"}) String id)
      Retrieves details of a specific job by ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the job to retrieve
      Returns:
      formatted job details or error message if not found

    • listRecruiters

      @ShellMethod(value="List all recruiters", key="list-recruiters") public String listRecruiters()
      Lists all recruiters in the system.
      Returns:
      formatted string of all recruiters or a message if none are found

    • createSampleJob

      @ShellMethod(value="Create sample job", key="create-sample-job") public String createSampleJob(@ShellOption(value={"-t","--title"},defaultValue="Software Engineer") String title, @ShellOption(value={"-c","--company"},defaultValue="Tech Corp") String company, @ShellOption(value={"-d","--description"},defaultValue="Develop applications") String description, @ShellOption(value={"-min","--min-salary"},defaultValue="50000") Double minSalary, @ShellOption(value={"-max","--max-salary"},defaultValue="80000") Double maxSalary, @ShellOption(value={"-l","--location"},defaultValue="New York") String location, @ShellOption(value={"-e","--employment-type"},defaultValue="Full-time") String employmentType, @ShellOption(value={"-r","--recruiter-id"},defaultValue="") String recruiterId)
      Creates a sample job with provided details.
      Parameters:
      title - job title
      company - company name
      description - job description
      minSalary - minimum salary
      maxSalary - maximum salary
      location - job location
      employmentType - employment type
      recruiterId - recruiter ID for the job
      Returns:
      success message including new job ID or error message

    • toggleJobStatus

      @ShellMethod(value="Update job status", key="toggle-job-status") public String toggleJobStatus(@ShellOption({"-i","--id"}) String id, @ShellOption(value={"-a","--active"},defaultValue="true") boolean active)
      Toggles a job's active status.
      Parameters:
      id - job ID to update
      active - new active status (true=active, false=inactive)
      Returns:
      confirmation message or error

    • searchJobs

      @ShellMethod(value="Search jobs by keyword", key="search-jobs") public String searchJobs(@ShellOption({"-k","--keyword"}) String keyword)
      Searches jobs by keyword across multiple fields.
      Parameters:
      keyword - term to search in job title, company, description, etc.
      Returns:
      list of matching jobs or message if none

    • filterByLocation

      @ShellMethod(value="Filter jobs by location", key="filter-by-location") public String filterByLocation(@ShellOption({"-l","--location"}) String location)
      Filters active jobs by location.
      Parameters:
      location - location to filter jobs
      Returns:
      list of active jobs in the location or message if none

    • filterByCompany

      @ShellMethod(value="Filter jobs by company", key="filter-by-company") public String filterByCompany(@ShellOption({"-c","--company"}) String company)
      Filters jobs by company name.
      Parameters:
      company - company to filter jobs
      Returns:
      list of jobs at the company or message if none

    • filterByTitle

      @ShellMethod(value="Filter jobs by title", key="filter-by-title") public String filterByTitle(@ShellOption({"-t","--title"}) String title)
      Filters jobs by title keyword.
      Parameters:
      title - title keyword to filter jobs
      Returns:
      list of jobs with matching titles or message if none

    • filterByRecruiter

      @ShellMethod(value="Filter jobs by recruiter", key="filter-by-recruiter") public String filterByRecruiter(@ShellOption({"-r","--recruiter-id"}) String recruiterId)
      Filters jobs by recruiter ID.
      Parameters:
      recruiterId - the recruiter ID to filter jobs
      Returns:
      list of jobs posted by the recruiter or message if none

      Deletes a job by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the job to delete
      Returns:
      confirmation message or error message
